questions.text: Who invented the first crystal radio?
What does a snubber diode do?
What are solid state drives most commonly used in?
True or False? Solid State components are moving parts.
True or False? Capacitors are solid state devices.
True or False? Voltage regulators are not solid state devices.
True or False? Resistors are solid state devices
True or False? LED's are not solid state devices.
